summary: MY HUSBAND WAS DRIVING OUR 1996 TAHOE WHEN IT JUST STOPPED!  WE FOUND THAT THE KEY HAD SHUT OFF WHILE DRIVING.  WE WERE IN  THE MIDDLE OF A THRUWAY WHEN EVERYONE WAS DRIVING 60 MPH.  A VERY DANGEROUS SITUATION INDEED.  THIS HAS HAPPENED 3 TIMES IN THE YEAR I'VE OWNED THE VEHICLE.  WE ARE ALSO HAVING A PROBLEM WITH THE WIPERS WORKING INTERMITTENTLY AND SOMETIMES GET STUCK IN THE MIDDLE OF THE WINDSHIELD OR JUMPING ACROSS THE WINDSHIELD POP, POP, POP.ETC.  *TR
